page.title: 10A typical Saturday.
page.content: On a Saturday I get up at 8.30am, one hour later than usual. I have my breakfast and then I decide where to go shopping. My family and I sometimes travel quite a way to go shopping and in summer we go to the seaside instead of shopping. We usually start our shopping by looking round the shops. My favourite is the bicycle shop. I like to look at the racing bikes. We then look around the big stores like{Marks and Spencers}and{Woolworths and my mum buys some groceries. If my father can afford to we go for a meal in a restaurant. In the afternoon we visit my grandad because he lives on his own. We watch television at night and then go to bed.
